settings.heading: Designer
settings.content:
Arne Vodder is a revered figure in the world of mid-century modern furniture design, renowned for his seminal contributions to the Danish design movement. Born in Denmark in 1926, Vodder's illustrious career was defined by his remarkable ability to harmonize form and function, resulting in pieces that embody the timeless elegance and functional minimalism characteristic of Scandinavian design. Collaborating with esteemed manufacturers like Fritz Hansen and Sibast Furniture, Vodder created iconic pieces such as the Vodder Sideboard and the Model 62 Chair, celebrated for their clean lines, organic shapes, and meticulous craftsmanship.

Vodder's designs continue to captivate contemporary audiences, epitomizing the enduring allure of mid-century modern aesthetics. His legacy serves as a beacon for designers worldwide, inspiring a new generation with his unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and the seamless integration of design and functionality. Arne Vodder's work remains a cornerstone of mid-century modern design, revered for its timeless appeal and profound influence on the evolution of furniture design.

Shop all Arne Vodder designs

settings.heading: The Brand
settings.content:
Sibast Furniture is a Danish company with a rich heritage spanning over 100 years in the realm of furniture craftsmanship. Established in 1908 by Peder Olsen Sibast, the brand quickly gained recognition for its exquisite woodworking and commitment to quality. Sibast Furniture's legacy is deeply rooted in the renowned Danish design tradition, characterized by clean lines, functional elegance, and an emphasis on natural materials.

Continuing the family legacy, the company was revitalized in 2012 by the fourth generation, Ditlev Sibast, who reintroduced some of the classic designs while also collaborating with contemporary designers to create innovative pieces that reflect the spirit of modern living. Each Sibast creation embodies a harmonious blend of timeless aesthetics and contemporary sensibilities, meticulously crafted to stand the test of time. With a dedication to sustainable practices and a reverence for the craft, Sibast Furniture remains an emblem of Danish design excellence, captivating enthusiasts and connoisseurs alike with its enduring beauty and craftsmanship.

settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content: All Sibast products are made to order. Please allow 8-12 weeks for delivery.

settings.text: Danish furniture maker Bent Hansen prioritizes comfort by integrating physical, visual, and emotional considerations into their designs.
